QuestData.Title: Brute Strength
QuestData.Description: Gandling has brought his lieutenant, Rattlegore, with him. This clattering horror is far more dangerous than any of the other Scourge you will find upon the battlefield... even the abominations.$b$bYou will find Rattlegore within an old town-hall building, near the center of town. I recommend caution before fighting him, $n. He will not be a pushover.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Outside of Scholomance, Rattlegore is weakened... but still powerful.
